title: Left Click Bugged
body:
So ever since today (played a match a few days ago and everything was fine) I can't use my left click for certain things?

These include:

- **Opening the shop** (Can use 'P' or left click gold by items fine)
- **Targeting anything**
- **Pings unless smart-casted**
- **Abilities unless smart-casted** (Projection animation comes up, left click and nothing happens on normal-cast)
- **My attack move** is horribly buggy with left click now for some reason

No idea how this happened, I have tried: deleting **input.ini** file, changing **keybinds ingame**, **client repair
**
But nothing works. My other 30 account for some reason is fine and has **no problems**.

Any solution would be appreciated

Thanks

replies.body:
Hey bCo,

Could you try the following?

Close League.
Go to C:\Riot Games\league of Legends\RADS\projects
Delete the Delete the lol_air_config_na folder
Restart the client to redownload it.
Log into NA
Go to C:\Riot Games\league of Legends\config
Delete PersistedSettings.json, game.cfg and input.ini
Create a custom game to test it.
